::Battera:;

She stood up and walked so she was infront of Rex.  She knelt down in 
front of him and took his hand. "Thank you."

She stood up and walked back to her chair and sat down.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex sighs, looking at Battera as she asked her question. He thinks 
it over 
> for a minute before finally arriving at a conclusion.
> 
> "No," he says sadly, "I have spent my entire life fighting the 
Predacons, for 
> revenge. I'm used to it now. Peace would be too alien a concept. 
But I will 
> be willing to cooperate."
